p: In the data analysis, three island neighborhoods namely Ilha dos Frades, Ilha de Mar√©, and Ilha de Bom Jesus dos Passos were excluded, because we considered that, through discontinuity with the territory, the processes that act for spatial diffusion of arboviruses could have differed. Centro Administrativo da Bahia (CAB) and Aeroporto were also excluded since they are not residential neighborhoods, making 5 of 163 neighborhoods excluded from the study.
